featured.text: Members can access thousands of listings for apartments, villas, suburban homes and farms around the world.
Without these underwater “apartment houses,” there would be fewer fish in the ocean.
The thief went into the apartment building and stole some jewelry.
What I can never understand B.…moved into a new apartment.
I like everything about the apartment the rent.

definition.zh_def: 一種供人居住的住宅單位，通常位於多層建築中。
definition.en_def: A self-contained housing unit that occupies part of a building, typically consisting of a living space, kitchen, and bathroom.
definition.example: She lives in a small apartment in the city.
